workshop.tools

Class VirustotalAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.tools.VirustotalAnalyzer

  • public class VirustotalAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    This malware analyzer uses the VirusTotal API:

    https://www.virustotal.com/

    Code written by:

    Kanishka Dilshan (kdkanishka)

    And obtained from:

    https://github.com/kdkanishka/Virustotal-Public-API-V2.0-Client

    1) Google API Key - "ABQIAAAAjU2rmwAtT1V5ywWwRjtMBBTedjNnG5K0Dey2aytYdRlzAQsvKQ"

    2) VirusTotal API Key - "8c89590ee6c610039ebc7d5bf924e6f00e5dd40ea866a6ce16ef9df84ac6d69d"
